name: Blic Oy
goal: We assist our clients in public affairs, policy advocacy and public relations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Trade, Transport
